verses.name: John 8:16
verses.text: And yet if I judge, my judgment is true: for I am not alone, but I and the Father that sent me.

verses.name: John 8:17
verses.text: It is also written in your law, that the testimony of two men is true.

verses.name: John 8:18
verses.text: I am one that bear witness of myself, and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me.

verses.name: John 8:19
verses.text: Then said they unto him, Where is thy Father? Jesus answered, Ye neither know me, nor my Father: if ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also.
